Opinion
per Curiam,
Judgment of sentence affirmed.

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Hicklen, Appellant.
Submitted April 17, 1972.
Before Jones, C. J., Ea-gen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
F. Glayton McQuiddy, III, Assistant Public Defender, for appellant.
Thomas G. Gavin, Assistant District Attorney, and 'William II. Lamb, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
June 28, 1972:
